    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lom.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>

            <catalog>CUP</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_211a1837cd8502b7c7453bd6ca793b78f35b1b4f</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Current</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Aktuell</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Actuel</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Atual</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Corrente</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Παρών</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Actual</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This diagram illustrates that a flow of free electrons to the  right corresponds to a current flowing in the opposite direction.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">flow</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">free electrons</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">negative charges</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">opposite direction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">positive charges</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Diagramm veranschaulicht, daß ein Fluß 
der freien Elektronen rechts einem aktuellen Fließen in die 
entgegengesetzte Richtung entspricht.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce diagramme illustre qu'un écoulement des 
électrons libres vers la droite correspond à une entrée actuelle 
dans la direction opposée.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este diagrama ilustra que um fluxo de elétrons 
livres à direita corresponde a fluir atual no sentido oposto.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo schema illustra che un flusso degli 
elettroni liberi alla destra corrisponde ad entrare corrente nel senso
opposto.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διάγραμμα διευκρινίζει ότι μια ροή των 
ελεύθερων ηλεκτρονίων στο δικαίωμα αντιστοιχεί σε μια παρούσα 
ροή στην αντίθετη κατεύθυνση.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este diagrama ilustra que un flujo de electrones 
libres a la derecha corresponde a fluir actual en la dirección 
opuesta.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Fluß</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">freie Elektronen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">negative Ladungen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">entgegengesetzte Richtung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">positive Ladungen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">écoulement</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">électrons libres</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">charges négatives</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">direction opposée</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">charges positives</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
